title: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' filters are not working
OB: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' filters are not functioning as expected. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open a new report. 2. Apply the 'Top N' or 'Bottom N' filter.
EB: After saving and previewing the report, no data is being displayed. Expected result: The data should be displayed according to the specified 'Top N' or 'Bottom N' and input parameters.
